title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's game and discusses the Christian McCaffrey trade to the Niners. What does the move do to their Super Bowl hopes? Former MLB Manager Joe Maddon shares what advice he'd give to Shohei Ohtani about his future, and Nick Wright gives us the speech he would have given to accept DP's Marconi this week.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
